intro: Independent tech business focused on building modern web and mobile solutions for startups, SMEs and agencies ‚Äì from consulting to operations.

As a freelancer, I delivered end-to-end: architecture, frontend (React/Next.js/Angular/Vue), mobile (Flutter/Dart) and backend (Java/Spring Boot), including databases (Firebase/Firestore, PostgreSQL, MySQL).
highlights: Photogrammetry and 3D scanning using machine learning & computer vision

intro: Amsel UG is a tech startup from Langg√∂ns offering a marketing and shop platform for regional producers and vending operators.
As CTO, I owned the technical roadmap and led implementation: Flutter/Dart app (Android/iOS) with secure login & role model, plus a scalable Java/Spring Boot backend.
Valtech Mobility is a development and consulting partner in the automotive (Connected Car) domain for premium brands such as Porsche, Audi, Bentley and Lamborghini.

As a consultant, I was responsible for the technical implementation and integration of new infotainment features, closely aligned with customers, and ensured delivery quality in a cross-functional team.
highlights: Integration of Apple Music, Podcasts & Spotify in Porsche infotainment
Implemented QR-code login for Porsche & Audi
POC for new login features for Porsche Android Automotive
Agile development with Scrum and Kanban

intro: Alcedis GmbH is a provider in the clinical studies domain with a focus on eClinical/clinical data management solutions.
As a software developer, I built test automation with Selenium/Gauge, integrated it into the development process, and developed web applications with Laravel, HTML/CSS/PHP and TypeScript.
highlights: Integrated test automation into the development process
3 years of web development with Laravel/PHP/TypeScript

intro: Alcedis GmbH is a provider in the clinical studies domain with a focus on eClinical/clinical data management solutions.
As a software tester, I performed functional and regression tests, built and maintained test documentation, and implemented first automation with Selenium/Gauge.
highlights: Close collaboration with engineering teams for defect analysis

Hero.title: About me
Hero.description: Discover the person behind the code - my passion for technology, my journey as a developer and what drives me.

PersonalStory.title: The person behind the code
PersonalStory.intro: Hi, I'm Thomas ‚Äì Fullstack freelancer with tech passion and startup DNA
PersonalStory.story1: My enthusiasm for technology started early ‚Äì like many others, first with gaming consoles, later with my first computer. But the decisive moment came during high school: In the IT class, I realized for the first time how much software development fascinates me. The hours flew by ‚Äì and that's when it was clear that I wanted to make more of this.
PersonalStory.story2: After studying Computer Science at the Technical University of Central Hesse in Gie√üen, I turned my passion for software development into a career.
PersonalStory.story3: Today I develop web and mobile applications with Next.js, React, Tailwind and TypeScript in the frontend as well as Python and AI integrations in the backend. I love greenfield projects where I can think along, help shape and build scalable architectures from the beginning.
PersonalStory.imageDescription: Focused on working on innovative solutions

workStyle.title: My work style
workStyle.subtitle: Depending on the project phase, I bring the right approach

startupWork.title: Why I prefer working with startups
startupWork.description: I enjoy working with people who are passionate about their ideas. That's exactly what I find with founders, startups and individuals with a clear vision. It's important to me not just to implement, but also to think along, question and take responsibility. I'm not a developer who just works through tasks ‚Äì but a sparring partner who communicates honestly, thinks along but also implements.

background.title: Personally motivated, technically curious
background.quote: "If I could have gone further in my career, I would have done it."
background.quoteDescription: My parents came back to Germany as Russian Germans and had to build a new life here. This sentence from my father accompanies me to this day. It motivates me to be brave, take responsibility and go new ways ‚Äì both in life and in technology.
background.bodybuilding: When I'm not coding, you'll probably find me at the gym or at Marvel movies in the cinema or eating. I do Natural Bodybuilding ‚Äì in 2018 I stood on stage at the GNBF and won 2nd place in the Junior Bodybuilding category up to 21 years Over 75kg.

PersonalStory.bodybuildingImageAlt: Thomas Schwabauer - GNBF Bodybuilding Competition 2018, 2nd Place

websiteRedesign.title: Web Redesign, UX & SEO Optimization

websiteRedesign.conclusion: Here are some before-and-after images; hover over the images to see the old design.
websiteRedesign.description: With my Web Redesign, UX & SEO Optimization package, I breathe new life into your website. I modernize your existing site, make it more visually appealing, and improve user experience (UX). My goal is to design user navigation so that your visitors can intuitively and quickly find the content they need. Through clear structures, appealing design, and well-thought-out navigation, I ensure that users feel comfortable on your site and achieve their goals efficiently.
websiteRedesign.description2: Additionally, I optimize search engine friendliness (SEO) to make your site more visible in search results. This increases your reach and helps you target your audience effectively. I also use heatmaps to continuously analyze user behavior. These allow me to see which areas of your site are heavily used and where users might encounter difficulties. Based on these insights, I continuously adapt the site to provide an optimal user experience.
websiteRedesign.description3: Through targeted measures, I not only enhance the attractiveness of your site but also its discoverability and customer satisfaction ‚Äì for long-term online success.

benefits.design: Modern, contemporary, and professional design that perfectly represents your brand.
benefits.collaboration: Long-term collaboration for continuous updates and adjustments.
benefits.cmsTooltipLabel2: system, enabling you to independently customize your website content without programming knowledge.
benefits.cmsTooltip5: allows you to easily add, edit, update, and publish content ‚Äì all without programming knowledge.

testimonial.text: Thanks to the redesign, our website now has a completely new look, and our customers interact much more frequently with our offerings. The collaboration was professional and efficient.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.introductionText: Thank you for visiting my website! We are committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your data when you use our services.
Privacy.informationWeCollectText: We collect information to improve our services and enhance your experience. The types of information we collect include:

informationWeCollectItems.personalInfo: Personal Identification Information (e.g., your name and email address) when provided by you voluntarily.
informationWeCollectItems.usageData: Usage Data such as your browser type, IP address, and how you interact with our website. This helps us analyze user behavior and improve our services.

Privacy.howWeUseYourDataText: We use your data for the following purposes:

howWeUseYourDataItems.personalize: To personalize your experience on our website.
howWeUseYourDataItems.provideServices: To provide, operate, and maintain our services.
howWeUseYourDataItems.improveFunctionality: To improve the functionality and usability of our website.
howWeUseYourDataItems.analyzeInteraction: To analyze and understand how users interact with our services to enhance the overall experience.
howWeUseYourDataItems.communicate: To communicate with you, such as providing support or updates.

Privacy.googleAnalyticsText: We use Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google LLC, to understand how visitors interact with our website. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect information about your use of the website, such as pages visited, time spent on the site, and referring websites. This data helps us analyze user behavior to improve the content and functionality of our website.
Privacy.googleAnalyticsOptOutText: You can opt out of Google Analytics tracking by installing the
Privacy.cookiesText: Our website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us understand your preferences and how you interact with our website. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies. If you do not wish to use cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings, though some features of our website may not function properly without them.
Privacy.thirdPartySharingText: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal data to third parties, except where it is necessary to provide services or comply with legal requirements. Google Analytics is the only third-party service provider involved, and data collected through Google Analytics may be processed by Google to provide web analytics services.
Privacy.securityOfInformationText: We take the security of your personal information seriously and use commercially acceptable measures to protect it. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
Privacy.yourRightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at {email}.
Privacy.changesToPolicyText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or services. The updated policy will be posted on this page, and the effective date will be revised accordingly.
Privacy.contactUsText: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at:

Imprint.title: Imprint
Imprint.vatIdText: VAT identification number according to ¬ß 27 a of the German VAT Act
Imprint.accountabilityForContentText: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the contents' accuracy, completeness, or topicality. According to statutory provisions, we are furthermore responsible for our own content on these web pages. In this context, please note that we are not obliged to monitor the transmitted or saved information of third parties, or investigate circumstances pointing to illegal activity.
Imprint.accountabilityForLinksText: Responsibility for the content of external links (to web pages of third parties) lies solely with the operators of the linked pages. No violations were evident to us at the time of linking. Should any legal infringement become known to us, we will remove the respective link immediately.
Imprint.privacyPolicyText1: This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google LLC. Google Analytics uses "cookies", which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users interact with the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States. We use this information to evaluate your use of the website, compile reports on website activity, and provide other services related to website activity and internet usage. You can prevent Google Analytics from using your data by installing the opt-out browser add-on provided by Google.
Imprint.privacyPolicyText2: For more information on how Google handles your data, please refer to their

Cookie.description: I use cookies to ensure you have the best possible experience on my website. For more details on how these cookies are used, please check out my cookie policy. By clicking "Accept", you agree to the use of cookies.
Cookie.descriptionSmall: I use cookies to make sure you have the best possible experience on my website. For more information, you can check out my cookie policy.
